## Visual Studio Code Keybindings for Mac

read the [docs](https://code.visualstudio.com/shortcuts/keyboard-shortcuts-macos.pdf)

| Action                        | Keybinding                        |
|-------------------------------|-----------------------------------|
| Show Command Palette           | `Cmd` + `Shift` + `P`             |
| Quick Open, Go to File         | `Cmd` + `P`                       |
| New window/instance            | `Cmd` + `Shift` + `N`             |
| Close window/instance          | `Cmd` + `W`                       |
| User Settings                  | `Cmd` + `,`                       |
| Keyboard Shortcuts             | `Cmd` + `K` `Cmd` + `S`           |
| Cut line (empty selection)     | `Cmd` + `X`                       |
| Copy line (empty selection)    | `Cmd` + `C`                       |
| Move line down/up              | `Option` + `Down/Up`              |
| Copy line down/up              | `Shift` + `Option` + `Down/Up`    |
| Insert line below/above        | `Cmd` + `Enter` / `Cmd` + `Shift` + `Enter` |
| Delete line                    | `Cmd` + `Shift` + `K`             |
| Indent/outdent line            | `Cmd` + `]` / `Cmd` + `[`         |
| Go to beginning/end of line    | `Cmd` + `Left/Right`              |
| Scroll line up/down            | `Ctrl` + `Up/Down`                |
| Fold/unfold region             | `Cmd` + `Option` + `[` / `]`      |
| Add line comment               | `Cmd` + `/`                       |
| Toggle block comment           | `Shift` + `Option` + `A`          |
| Toggle word wrap               | `Option` + `Z`                    |
| Insert cursor                  | `Option` + `Cmd` + `Down/Up`      |
| Select all occurrences         | `Cmd` + `Shift` + `L`             |
| Expand/shrink selection        | `Shift` + `Option` + `Right/Left` |
| Find                           | `Cmd` + `F`                       |
| Replace                        | `Cmd` + `Option` + `F`            |
| Find next/previous             | `Cmd` + `G` / `Cmd` + `Shift` + `G` |
| Format document                | `Shift` + `Option` + `F`          |
| Go to Symbol                   | `Cmd` + `Shift` + `O`             |
| Go to Definition               | `F12`                             |
| Quick Fix                      | `Cmd` + `.`                       |
| Show Explorer / Toggle focus   | `Cmd` + `Shift` + `E`             |
| Show Source Control            | `Ctrl` + `Shift` + `G`             |
| Show Debug                     | `Cmd` + `Shift` + `D`             |
| Show Extensions                | `Cmd` + `Shift` + `X`             |
| Show Output panel              | `Cmd` + `Shift` + `U`             |
| Open Markdown preview          | `Cmd` + `Shift` + `V`             |
| Toggle integrated terminal     | `` Ctrl + ` ``                    |
| Create new terminal            | `Ctrl` + `Shift` + `` ` ``        |
| Copy selection (terminal)      | `Cmd` + `C`                       |
| Scroll up/down (terminal)      | `Cmd` + `Up/Down`                 |
| Zen Mode                       | `Cmd` + `K` `Z`                   |
| inline copilot                 | `Cmd` + `I`                      |
| open codex                   | `Cmd` + `Shift` + `C` + `X`        |
| close codex                   | `Cmd` + `Shift` + `C` + `X`       |
| new terminal tab                   | `TODO`       |
| navigate terminal tabs                   | `TODO`       |
